comments.text: for some reason people can just kinda walk/clip through some of my walls and doors and it kinda ruins some things on my map so i just wanted to say something about it!
dunno of its an issue or its just too thin?
right that's buggy at the moment, sorry for that! we already tried to fix it but it needs more investigation on proper remedies!
alrighty, hopefully it can be fixed at some point, thank you!
